text: Is anyone could please take a look on this? It seems it affects all templates that using built in module Header in every section, no option for H2, H3, H4. Thanks
It's editable from the template, but not from the page. I would suggest just using a rich text module instead.
This really should be editable on the front end. Bad SEO for multiple h1s
I think it made sense in the old DM… the developer determined the headings. Now that the content creators have more control, it makes sense to “unlock” this feature

We are looking to make the header module more flexible--and we’re pretty close to making it happen. To start, we’d make it so you could change the header level only on drag and drop pages (and not static pages)--does that sound ok to you guys?

<https://app.slack.com/team/U3A4KEWK1|@ianrmcnair> I tried it to edit on Template level but still *not working if you view source it still H1 on existing live pages :(* but Rich Text would do to have editable Headings but you need to update all dependencies live pages again :(*.* Thanks much guys <@U3A4KEWK1> <@U3T21PDBK> <@U8THBCFC4> for your suggestions and solutions. Please let us know once this header level feature is available.
